review:
Remember kids, overwatch 1 is gone and was replaced by this. So if you're ever told by this game that anything is "permanent", just know that no matter how much you spend on this game, they'll probably remove it later anyway.
Also the company is horrid, only download if you're planning on leaving an accurately bad review like everyone else.

Remember what Activision did to Warcraft 3?

Remember what Activision did to Heroes of the storm?

Remember what Activision did to Overwatch 1?

IT IS GOING TO HAPPEN TO YOU!
After playing this I realized that Paladins is a decent game

Truly hope that Microsoft's acquisition fails and Blizzard goes bankrupt soon.
Sin pornito de la traser no tiene sentido jugar
This game-shaped joke makes Paladins look like a game of the year
You will have more fun reading the reviews than playing the game.

Despite the thousands of people in the gaming community bandwagon hating on this game, It is a fun game and no other game can quite replace this for me.
You should actually thank OW for the wonderful time spend on Ñ€Ğ¾rnhub

I love this game, have been playing it on and off for years at this point. I consider it a mix between a MOBA and an FPS, similar to TF2 (although much more fun imo).

Current Blizzard sucks yes, and releasing Overwatch 2 was a definite misstep, but I still consider it to be as good as it always was as Overwatch. The team-play and competitive elements are like nothing else.
